May 6, 1899 D Skelmanthorpe Contest
Skelmanthorpe Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
skelmanthorpe-contest
None
Skelmanthorpe, Yorkshire 1st prize £7, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Holme, 2nd (10s,) Leeds City. 6th annual contest promoted by Skelmanthorpe band 8 bands competed.
Oct. 27, 2011, 5:48 p.m. Jan. 29, 2020, 7:15 p.m.
